questions.question: What are the consultant's relevant certifications?

candidates.cv:
A fellow of the British Computer Society, a creative and influential leader with over 35 years of experience in delivering business aligned Technology Strategies, Architectures and Systems across a diverse range of industries and markets. A motivational team builder and an excellent communicator with a proven track record of enthusing and energising teams to deliver technical solutions to meet corporate business needs.

Highly experienced in roles including  IT Director, Design Authority, Head of Architecture, Programme Director and leading teams of architects and designers within technically challenging and demanding environments.                                                  

I spend my days listening to companies who've got complex digital challenges they need to overcome to deliver critical business outcomes. These range from providing the best possible customer service and experience, to optimising operational efficiencies, staying on the right side of compliance, and innovating with AI, blockchain, cloud, sensors, low code, and more. They are looking for unbiased and sound advice they can trust.

All these organisations have a common desire to utilise the power of digital to stay competitive and deliver value to their customers, colleagues and partners. They are all on a journey of becoming digital and data driven but are faced with legacy systems, regulatory pressures, competition, multitude of applications and platforms, and are often overcome with the huge choices that modern digital technology can offer. That's when we come alive.

I've built a team in London and Pune over 15 years that loves to roll up its sleeves and get embroiled in these challenges. We're good listeners, analytical thinkers, collaborators � and ultimately problem solvers.

I've always believed that technology and data are there to improve people's lives and not an end in themselves � I keep everyone focused on that goal. My aim is to see humanity thrive through good business, using the very best that technology can offer.

We've enjoyed solving complex data and technology problems for the likes of Flight Centre, Meggitt, Vision Express, TUI, Autovista, Carphone Warehouse, AOL Broadband, Tesco Telecom and Travis Perkins, hopefully making the lives of their staff, customers, and partners better than they otherwise might have been.

experiences.title: Interim Programme Director for Customer Experience

candidates.cv:
A Software Engineer and data scientist with over 25 years of professional experience in different companies. I spent a good part of my professional career working in projects related to the aviation industry and the rest as developer in Talend and Java based projects.
In 2019 I commenced my learning on Artificial Intelligence and Deep Learning and related technologies and participated in several Kaggle competitions.
I also contribute regularly several open source components to Talend Exchange.
I dedicate my weekends to my pet projects for UK charities which promote well-being and meditation.

experiences.company_name: One Point IT Consulting Pvt. Ltd.
experiences.title: Software Developer

candidates.cv:
An experienced data and integration architect with extensive knowledge of cloud technologies and enterprise infrastructure.
Over 20 years of experience and core skills in enterprise architecture, enterprise infrastructure, Big Data processing, Data Science, and systems development.
Currently  focused on designing, implementing, and integrating Machine Learning, Data Management, and data-oriented workflow solutions. 
Experience includes being Lead Architect for TUI, Vision Express, AOL Broadband, UK Broadband, Autolus, and Meggitt. 
Have also run a series of Proof of Concepts (PoCs) and implementation projects of big data solutions using Apache Hadoop, Apache Spark and Snowflake.
Experienced in architecting and delivering enterprise-grade solutions on Amazon AWS, Microsoft Azure, and Google Cloud platforms. He is experienced in technologies including Snowflake, Boomi, Talend, Mulesoft, WSO2, and Node.
Recently was leading the implementation of a Data Processing solution on Azure involving Databricks cluster, notebooks, Data Factory, Azure Logic Apps, and Azure functions.

experiences.title: Transition Architect, Consultant - One Point Consulting

candidates.cv:
Miguel's latest interests include Delivering Value to Clients every week and Design to cost in order to bring to the client the experience of constant progress towards the initially defined goals.

With over 15 years of experience Miguel has worked on multinational projects involving several european countries and has worked for major organisations including working for 4 years in Portugal Telecom. He had been a Software Architect, Senior Business Analyst, Technical Team Lead and Senior Developer delivering systems ranging from high performance web enabled transactional systems to interactive workflow and business process solutions.

Miguel speaks three European Languages - Portuguese, English and basic Spanish.

Education: 5 years BSC Computer Science and Engineering degree at IST (Instituto Superior T�cnico), Portugal

experiences.title: Software Architect and Senior Business Analyst

candidates.cv:
Enterprise Solutions Architect and Open Source evangelist with experience in shaping the architectural landscape for transitional/business change programs. Current interests are very much in the area of AI, Big Data solutions and analytics.

Specialities: Open Source solutions, AI, LLMs, VLMs, Big Data, Apache Spark, Snowflake, AWS, Azure, Google Cloud, Kubernetes, PostgreSQL, Python, Java and more.

Sangeetha is a CSM, DSDM, PRINCE 2 Certified Programme manager with an overall 16+ years of work experience. She previously managed the project team for TUI, Axalta, FlightCentre, and Vision Express related data management projects and played the primary role in setting up the training department and facilities during her time with Toyota group as Skills Development Facilitator. She takes a flexible and positive approach to work. She has a Master�s Degree in Computer Applications and a Bachelors in Chemistry.

experiences.title: Director of Project Delivery and Operations
Head of Project Delivery and Operations

candidates.cv:
Over 20 years in-depth experience in designing and developing End-to-End monitoring solutions. With a full comprehensive knowledge and experience of supporting and monitoring high availability e-commerce systems, online payment systems and banking applications.  

Product lead & SME for the design and implementation of Dynatrace for Lloyds Banking Group to monitor the critical payment and business applications.

Created and established the Operations Support team for Harrods.com.

Introduced both the ITIL and the DevOps framework to Harrods E-commerce Operations Team. 

Successfully implemented Akamai CDN to Harrods.com to achieve greater international presence.

Implemented monitoring tools Gomez and Dynatrace AppMon for Harrods.com 

Key stakeholder and vendor management skills from both development projects and operations.

Responsible for PCI-DSS and DPA compliance.

Lead Designer for John Lewis, designing their new call centre website. Designed to enable call centre agents to quickly take customer orders over the phone, reduce the time for training and improve the rate of cross sales and up sales

Implemented Card Authentication for John Lewis. This high level project required complex business planning to ensure that the customer checkout experience was not compromised.
